medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 week ago with sharp/crampy abdominal pain associated with diarrhea. After several days, the pain localized to the RLQ. The patient experienced associated fevers up to 101.3 F last night along with chills, nausea, and non-bilious, non-bloody emesis. Appetite has been good.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Ascending colon diverticulosis, lactose intolerance, colonic polyps s/p resection (removal of adenoma), headaches.
medical_history.family_history: Father has a history of diverticulosis, otherwise healthy. Mother is healthy. Two brothers are healthy; older brother is s/p appendectomy. Denies family history of inflammatory bowel disease or cancer.
